channel.title: Starters and Drop traders
channel.description:
Ok, I'm currently working on a DELTA [yes delta] based server. I would like to add a starter into the server. However, I'm aware that people will then drop trade the 5m or whatever to a main to make money. One of my friends came up with an idea that sounds pretty good, I'm just completely stumped on getting started. His idea was the following: The characters start with a "token" thats only to be spent in a certain store and cannot be traded or dropped.
Now, if anyone can get me pointed in the right direction I'd greatly appreicate it. I may just not be seeing something when it comes to this idea, or it may be a huge pain to accomplish. If you've got another idea please PM me with details.
Thanks for reading, CC.
Basically what I'd like to accomplish is: Giving new members a starter but not letting them drop trade it or transfer it. Sure, you can ban them as you catch them, but you're not going to catch everyone that does it.

item.title: Starters and Drop traders
item.dc:creator: @Exiled-Isle Exiled-Isle
item.description:
@Exiled-Isle wrote:

Corrupted just make a shop that accepts tokuuls an easy item to work with, then make it untradable by going and looking through your client til’ you find the untradable list.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Corrupted_Chaos Corrupted_Chaos
item.description:
@Corrupted_Chaos wrote:

Ok thanks everyone for your help.

Read full topic
